assert:
=LET(
    one, {"a"},
    another, {"A"},
    expect, {"a","A"},
    actual, JOIN.CROSSJOIN(one, another),
    XLFUT.ASSERT_SAME(actual, expect)
)

=LET(
    one, {"1a","1b","1c","1d"},
    another, {"1A","1B","1C","1D","1E","1F"},
    expect, {"1a","1b","1c","1d","1A","1B","1C","1D","1E","1F"},
    actual, JOIN.CROSSJOIN(one, another),
    XLFUT.ASSERT_SAME(actual, expect)
)
